 PRIVACY POLICY 
 STORE POLICIES 
Our Products
Pernia's pop-up shop.com sells luxury fashion from India’s most coveted designers. To view a complete list of all our designers, click on the DESIGNERS category. As an authorized online distributor for all of the designers we feature, we unconditionally guarantee that every item we sell is 100% authentic.
How to Shop
1. Use the CLOTHING, DESIGNERS, CLASSICS and ACCESSORIES links to help you find what you are looking for. You can also shop by browsing alphabetically by designer names.
2. Once you have found an item you wish to purchase, select your size and click on the ADD TO SHOPPING BAG button below each item.
3. Review the items in your shopping bag by clicking the SHOPPING BAG link at the top of the page. You can use the REMOVE FROM BASKET link to delete items from your shopping bag.
4. Click on PROCEED TO PURCHASE to complete your order.
First time Orders
For your security, please be aware that first-time orders can only be shipped to the cardholder's billing address or a corporate work address which we are able to verify independently. To avoid delays to your order, please ensure that your billing address matches the address on your card statement, and that the cardholder's name is written as it appears on the card. For Cash on Delivery orders, please also ensure that your contact details are filled in accurately so that we can contact you if necessary.
Sizing Information
Sizing varies considerably amongst the designers we stock. So to help you choose the best size, you'll find the following information on every product page:
1. A link to a 'size conversion chart' to help you convert international sizes, as well as product measurements and a guide to using these.
2. A 'size & fit ' section with further information on how the garment fits, and whether it runs true, small or large to size.
If you need more help, our customer care team can answer all your questions on sizing and fit - simply email 
customercare@perniaspopupshop.com
 for advice. See our Returns & Exchanges section for more information.
Packaging Options
Signature Packaging
Your order will be delivered in our signature black boxes* which not only look fabulous, but make the perfect storage solution! Please note that your entire order will be packed in a signature Pernia's Pop-Up Shop black box.
Sales
Pernia's Pop-Up Shop offers sales few times a year. To be notified as soon as our sale starts and of further reductions, click here
Sale price adjustment policy
Pernia's Pop-Up Shop is unable to offer price adjustment on items originally purchased in a sale or on any special promotion items that are temporarily reduced in price.
Redeeming a Promotional Code
From time to time we run offers using promotional codes. When placing your order, simply follow these three steps to redeem your discount.
1. Type in the code in the promotional code box on the payment page and click 'SUBMIT'.
2. Enter the words shown in the box for additional security, followed by 'SUBMIT'.
3. Check that your discount has been applied under the order summary on the payment page and then click 'PURCHASE NOW'.
For further assistance please contact 
customercare@perniaspopupshop.com.
Your Account
Register with us and you'll be able to enjoy the following benefits through your Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop account:
1. Track your orders and review past purchases
2. Request your return or exchange directly from your account
3. Save your address and card details so you can shop even quicker next time
4. Manage your account details, address book and email preferences
To create an account, simply click on SIGN IN and then REGISTER NOW to fill in your details.
Forgot Password
If you have forgotten your password, click here to change it or follow the FORGOT PASSWORD instructions on the SIGN IN page.

Shop Jade By Ashima at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop

 Love grandeur in fashion? Then Jade By Ashima is the perfect fashion label for you. It is all about luxury clothing for women to look and feel their best. This designer label is the perfect amalgamation of traditional styles and modern elements to create iconic fashion pieces that make you shine. If you are looking to experiment with the Indo-Western fashion segment, then this designer label is one of the trendiest choices to consider. As a brand that quickly adapts to the latest fashion trends, this one is a trendsetter in several categories like sarees, jumpsuits, skirt sets, pant sets, capes, and others. For modern women who love to try all the bold new styles, the Jade By Ashima collection at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop makes shopping enjoyable. Shop Womenswear designers like 
Swati Jain
, Gopi Vaid, Bhumika Sharma, 
Ek Katha
, & more at Pernia's Pop Up Shop.

 
Shop Jade By Ashima Sarees at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop

 This designer has a way of making even the simplest styles look grand with the right kind of cuts and catchy details. There are saree sets from this range that are offered as draped sarees to save you all the time otherwise spent on ensuring those perfect pleats. These are also paired with blouses that are adorned with sequins and the most interesting cuts. For stylish party wear sarees that look so different than traditional styles, check out the Jade By Ashima sarees available at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop. Check out Sarees by 
Diya Rajvvir
, Ri Ritu Kumar, Masaba, 
Aditri
, & more at Pernia's Pop Up Shop.

 
Shop Jade By Ashima Skirt Sets at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop

 This collection features some of the prettiest looking skirts that make it easy for every woman to flaunt a celebrity-like outfit with utmost ease. Mild and pleasing hues and ruffles, layers, and embroidery work on the skirts and blouses make these some of the most awe-inspiring styles for women to try. If you need unique skirt sets that make you look extra-beautiful on special occasions, shop Jade By Ashima skirt sets from Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop. Checkout designer skirt sets by 
Miku Kumar
 at Pernia’s Pop up Shop.

 
Shop Jade By Ashima Jumpsuits at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop

 Women who love to try fusion wear would instantly fall in love with the cool jumpsuits from this range. Pleated pants, ruffled sleeves, bell sleeves, lace details, bead embellishments, and a variety of elements are mixed and matched to create the perfect jumpsuit for every woman in the Jade by Ashima jumpsuits range, now available at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop. Shop designer jumpsuits by 
Nupur Kanoi
, Payal Singhal, Tarun Tahiliani, & more at Pernia’s Pop up Shop.

Shop the latest Palak and Mehak Designer Collection at Pernia’s Pop Up Shop

Palak and Mehak is a high fashion designer brand that brings out a distinctly Indian aesthetic with a contemporary point of view through their fusion and ethnic luxury wear for women. This innovative eponymous label was founded by fashion designer duo, Palak and Mehak. Being a luxury label that is founded by women and designs for women, they have an uncanny knack for understanding the tastes and needs of the modern Indian woman. They are constantly inspired by the women they style for who are fierce and feminine, regal and majestic, and elegant and graceful. Each of their luxury garments is beautifully, ethically, and sustainably crafted by hand, which only makes us love them. They promote the work of local artisans and honor the rich legacy of traditional embroidery in India. Palak and Mehak hope to revive old crafts and put their own signature twist on it. Constructing their clothes from top quality raw materials such as tussar, dupion silk, cotton, organza, georgette, and net and then further embellishing them with pearls, sequins, and beads; Palak and Mehak ensure international standards on all their collections. Shop the elegant and exquisite Palak and Mehak Designer Collection at Pernia’s Pop Up Shop. We bring to you a wide array of designer Indian wear such as designer kurta sets, designer anarkalis, designer sarees, designer sharara sets, and more. This is complemented by an equally impressive collection of designer fusion and western wear including designer dresses, designer gowns, designer pant sets, designer skirt sets, designer jacket sets, designer cape sets, and much more. Find select pieces from this designer in our specially curated ranges of 
Designer Bridal Anarkalis
 and 
Designer Lucknowi Anarkalis
. No matter what you choose, you are sure to make an unforgettable fashion statement in a Palak and Mehak creation!

 
Browse the fresh new range of Palak and Mehak Designer Anarkalis and Kurta Sets

The universal allure and fascination of the anarkali dress and kurta sets for women is evident throughout history. These are ethereal garments that are the epitome of softness, fluidity, and femininity. Its flowy silhouette gives the wearer a dancer-like movement, thus, creating a picture of absolute grace and charm. Infusing new life into this quintessential garment, shop the fresh new range of Palak and Mehak Designer Anarkalis and Kurta Sets. Stand out from the crowd in a sage green crinkled anarkali gown made in a soft cotton mulmul base; worn with a matching floral printed dupatta having hand embroidery. Show off your playful sense of style with an embroidered kurta set made of a red kurta in a soft rayon crepe base with vertical stripes and an attached crushed skirt. It is paired with a contrasting peach chiffon dupatta adorned with rose motifs and golden embroidery. Born straight out of a minimalist’s fantasy, wear a peach anarkali suit for weddings cut from a soft modal fabric and decorated with hand embroidery. It is paired with contrasting rose pink flared sharara pants in a soft mulmul cotton base and a scalloped sage green printed dupatta in a soft chanderi silk base. Browse more designer ethnic and contemporary occasion wear for women with the curations of 
Jiya by Veer Designs
, 
Sub Culture
, Kazmi India, Kudi Pataka Designs, and more. 

 
Explore the incredible new range of Palak and Mehak Designer Dresses

Give your personal wardrobe a glam makeover with select pieces from the incredible new range of Palak and Mehak Designer Dresses, which boasts of a gorgeous variety of designer one shoulder dresses, designer long dresses, designer cowl dresses, designer party wear dresses, designer maxi dresses, designer midi dresses, designer evening dresses, and much more. Show off your polished and artistic sense of fashion in a lavender one shoulder dress made in a soft mulmul base adorned with floral hand embroidery. The look comes with a silver belt that clinches at the waist and gives an hourglass silhouette that looks attractive on all body shapes. Go for a fun, flirty, and feminine ensemble with a cream cape crafted from a chanderi base with a silver and gold chevron embroidery. It is worn over a matching maxi dress in a soft cotton mulmul base. Style it with minimal silver earrings and your favourite juttis for a graceful vibe. Look fierce and fashionable in a mustard cowl dress cut from a soft rayon crepe base and primped with gold lurex details. It has a gold thread and gota embroidered neckline that will look amazing with gold statement earrings. Continue your journey with India’s premier luxury fashion marketplace and shop more couture wear from the top design houses in the country with the collections of 
Drishti and Zahabia
, 
Disha Kahai
, Platform 9, Swati Jain, Masaba, and more - only at Pernia’s Pop Up Shop!

 Paulmi & Harsh
About Paulmi & Harsh - where nature meets aesthetic. 
Deriving inspiration from breathtaking botanicals in nature, Paulmi and Harsh is a luxury ready-to-wear label. Bringing the fashion from 1950s to modern silhouettes and styles, the label focuses on delicate detailing and 
aesthetic designs
. The clothing is strong with eye-pleasing and nature-inspired prints, making it stand out with being overdone. The label uses locally sourced fabrics to create wearable masterpieces. With extra attention given to detail and precision practised every step of the way during the production process, the garments are made in small batches by skilled craftsmen. The prints are carefully and individually hand painted first, then printed digitally. To bring them out even more, they are then enhanced with embroidery, thus transforming the collections into works of art. Designs by Paulmi & Harsh have been spotted on B-town celebrities too, including names like Kalki Koechlin, Tapsee Pannu, Monica Dogra, Sonal Chauhan, Neeti Mohan, Krystle D’souza, Ankita Lokhande, Neha Kakkar, Mughda Godse, Raveen Tandon, Richa Chadha, Amrita Rao, Daisy Shah, Neha Dhupia and many more. Get your hands on Paulmi & Harsh designer collection online in India on Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop.
 
Paulmi & Harsh Palazzo Suits to stun in. 
Whoever said dresses were only for summers was clearly mistaken, cause we beg to differ. 
Dresses
 are an ageless addition to a woman’s closet solely because of how statement-making they really are. Another reason for owning lots of dresses is that there are hundreds of ways to them so you never run out of ideas. Paulmi & Harsh dresses are luxe and easy to wear & flaunt. With nature-inspired prints in a tasteful palette adorning these dresses, you just can’t go wrong. Their versatility is what makes them appropriate for every season, and they’re made with fine quality fabrics so you never have to fuss about wearing them off! Take your pick from Paulmi & Harsh Dresses online in India on Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop.
 
Paulmi & Harsh Lehenga for the wedding celebrations. 
Get your twirl on this wedding season! Ladies, there is absolutely no reason to not love a 
lehenga
, and we know you’d agree. When weddings and the celebrations that precede or follow come into the picture, lehengas are the ultimate winners. But 
weddings
 can get tiring, and heavy designer lehengas might not be for the ones seeking comfort. Enter Paulmi & Harsh lehengas that are as light as they are stylish. With a mix of embroidery and prints, these lehengas weave a dream. Find a Paulmi & Harsh lehenga you love, in beautiful colours online in India on Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop. also shop for 
Men's Resort Wear Shirts
, 

Beach Wear for Men
, 

Beach Wear Tops
 & more.

 Pernia’s Pop-Up.

lehenga

Designer Kurtas
 and dupatta sets are very versatile pieces and thus it is important to have one in your wardrobe. If you are jeans or denim fan, no worries, you can also rock your traditional kurta look by pairing it with mom jeans or a skinny one. Just add on some oxidized jumka 
earrings

wedding

Being a staple for ages, Kurta Sets For Women had their own history when it comes to design.  Fashion experts and connoisseur designers have given their own twists and showcased it on the runway. Over the years, as the trends have fluctuated so has the designs on kurtas and tunics. From full sleeves to off-shoulder and from simple plain kurtas to tunic along with kurta dresses, they have seen it all. Kurta Sets For Women looks effortlessly beautiful no matter what the occasion is, be it a regular office day or your sisters' wedding - it is sure to leave you with compliments. The embroidery and the complicated print along with the texture and the fabric makes it look a lot elegant. You can choose a type of kurta depending on the occasion you want to attend. There is a different type of prints and patterns that you can choose from like floral, geometric, tribal and caricature prints.  Anarkali

There is also a range of Kurta Sets For Women that have a mix of both traditional as well as modern touch which makes it gorgeous and convenient for a new age Indian women. PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Featuring a peach kalidar kurta in lawn cotton base with print and lace detailing. It is paired with matching embroidered palazzo pants and a chanderi embroidered dupatta.
PRODUCT CODE
SSGC052342
Components
3
FIT
Fitted at bust and waist.
COMPOSITION
Lawn cotton, Chanderi.
CARE
Dry clean only.

 Shop Sage Saga at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop 
 Sage Saga is a beautiful fashion brand that brings to the table sophistication, style, an array of colours, and elegance, all at once. The designs from the brand are a medley of different cultures and traditions too and you will be awed at how intricate the detailing is. The label tries to highlight the beauty of the fabric and keeps the sheen, feel, and look of it at the forefront. Created by experienced weavers, the designs are to die for. You can buy kurtas, pants, tunics, and dupattas from this brand at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop at the best possible prices. Check out designer womenswear by 
Devyani Mehrotra
, A Humming Way, Amit GT, Rar Studio, 
Ava Designs
, & more at Pernia's Pop Up Shop.
 
 Shop Sage Saga Kurta Sets at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop

 Sage Saga kurta sets come with sleek kurtas, matching pants, and airy dupattas, to complete your look. These sets are put together keeping in mind the colours that complement each other and look stunning, to say the least. Pick a couple of these kurta sets by Sage Saga, 
Saksham and Neharicka
, Abstract by Megha Jain Madaan, 
Yashodhara
, & more at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop and you can mix them up and create completely new styles every day. 
 
 Shop Sage Saga Kurtas at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop

 Kurtas have become wardrobe staples for Indian women. You can dress up or dress down kurtas easily according to the occasion. The printed kurtas from the label are extremely comfortable and relaxed. These are great for casual days and evenings and make you feel confident about your look. You can pair these printed kurtas with denim pants or straight solid ones as well. Plain solid Sage Saga kurtas with intricate embroidery are versatile pieces that you can buy from Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop. Check out designers 
Lucknowi Kurti
, Bnadhani Kurta, Banarasi Kurti, 
Chikankari Kurti
, & more at Pernia's Pop Up Shop.

 
 Shop Sage Saga Pants at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop

 Looking for smart pants to match your existing tunics and kurtas? Check out the stylish Sage Saga pants. These are available in both solid colours and prints and are smart and chic. You will love how comfortable these make you feel. This label also brings you smart salwar pants in many practical shades for everyday wear. Get your hands on them at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop now.  Also check out designer 
Pant Suits for Women
 at Pernia's Pop Up Shop.

 
 Shop Sage Saga Dupattas at Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop

 Dupattas are accessories that can make your attire look well-rounded. The Sage Saga dupattas are super versatile and can be worn in so many different ways. Made from handloom cotton, these are long and generous and come with detailed prints and lacework. Pick up these stunners from Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop right away. Also check out 
Chikankari Dupatta
, Bandhani Dupatta, Banarasi Dupatta, 
Lucknowi Dupatta
, & more at Penria's Pop Up Shop.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Featuring a blue kurta in lawn cotton base with print and lace detailing. It is paired with matching embroidered palazzo pants and a chanderi embroidered dupatta.

FIT

COMPOSITION
Lawn cotton, Chanderi.
CARE
Dry clean only.

KNOW MORE
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Featuring a sage kurta in lawn cotton base with johri bazar print and crochet lace detailing. It is paired with matching dobby cotton palazzo pants having dainty lace hem detailing and an organza embroidered dupatta.
PRODUCT CODE
SSGC122201
FIT
Fitted at bust and waist.
COMPOSITION
Lawn cotton, Dobby cotton, Organza.
CARE
Dry clean only.
SHIPPING INFORMATION
This product will be shipped to you after 3-4 weeks from the date of order placed. All custom made orders are not returnable.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Featuring a pink flowy kurta in silk bemberg base with lurex lace detailing. It is paired with matching pants and a chiffon dupatta.
PRODUCT CODE
SSGC022301
FIT
Fitted at bust and waist.
COMPOSITION
Silk bemberg, Chiffon.
CARE
Dry clean only.
SHIPPING INFORMATION
This product will be shipped to you after 3-4 weeks from the date of order placed. All custom made orders are not returnable.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Featuring a charcoal flowy kurta in silk bemberg base with lurex lace detailing. It is paired with matching pants and a chiffon dupatta.

FIT
Fitted at bust and waist.
COMPOSITION
Silk bemberg, Chiffon.
CARE
Dry clean only.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Featuring a wine flared kurta in silk bemberg base with hand embroidery. It is paired with matching tulip pants having lurex lace detailing and a chanderi silk hand embroidered dupatta.
PRODUCT CODE
SSGC022305
FIT
Fitted at bust and waist.
COMPOSITION
Silk bemberg, Chanderi silk.
CARE
Dry clean only.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Featuring a grey blue flared kurta in silk bemberg base with hand embroidery. It is paired with matching tulip pants having lurex lace detailing and a chanderi silk hand embroidered dupatta.
PRODUCT CODE
SSGC022307
FIT
Fitted at bust and waist.
COMPOSITION
Silk bemberg, Chanderi silk.
CARE
Dry clean only.

This product will be shipped to you after 3-4 weeks from the date of order placed. All custom made orders are not returnable.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Featuring a mustard flared kurta in silk bemberg base with hand embroidery. It is paired with matching tulip pants having lurex lace detailing and a chanderi silk hand embroidered dupatta.
PRODUCT CODE
SSGC022309
FIT
Fitted at bust and waist.
COMPOSITION
Silk bemberg, Chanderi silk.
CARE
Dry clean only.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Featuring a mustard flared kurta in silk bemberg base with hand embroidery. It is paired with matching tulip pants having lurex lace detailing. This contains only two pieces.
PRODUCT CODE
SSGC022310
FIT
Fitted at bust and waist.
COMPOSITION
Silk bemberg.
CARE
Dry clean only.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Featuring a wine flowy kurta in silk bemberg base with hand embroidery. It is paired with matching pants having lurex lace detailing and a chanderi silk hand embroidered dupatta.
PRODUCT CODE
SSGC022311
FIT
Fitted at bust and waist.
COMPOSITION
Silk bemberg, Chanderi silk.
CARE
Dry clean only.
